data: List of Current Clubs This is a list of the current, completely approved clubs. Some more organizations exist on campus, and SGA will be adding them periodically. For any questions, contact Logan Ward ! Comprehensive Club List and Description Click the yellow button below to access the list. Click Here for the List Clubs at Centre College Afro-Fusion Club Afro-Caribbean Heritage Club After School Program (ASP) Alpha Phi Omega (APO) Art Society Asian American and Pacific Islander Coalition (AAPIC) Badminton Club Baptist Campus Ministry Brother to Brother Best Buddies Beta Beta Beta (Tri Beta) Black STEM Coalition Campus Life Ministry Centre Christian Fellowship Centre College Democrats Centre College Crochet Club Centre College Republicans Centre Players Chess Club Colonels United Centre Environmental Association Centre Feminists Centre Firsts Centre Players Centre Pride Alliance Centre Quizbowl Centre Students for Prevention, Education, and Advocacy in the Community (SPEAC) Centre Union for Affirming Christians Chinese Culture Club (CCC) Food Recovery Network Gardening Club German Club Girls Who Code College Loop International Student Association (ISA) Investment Society Japanese Club Jewish Student Organization (JSO) Latine Club Muslim Student Association National Society for Leadership and Success Newman Club Partners in Health Engage Pre - Dental Society Pre - Health Society Pre - PA Society Pre - Veterinary Society Pride in Black Art Psychology/ BNS Club Rock Climbing Club Sister to Sister Society of Physics Students South Asian Cultural Association (SACA) The Outdoors Club Vantage Poin Vantage Point Vietnamese Student Association (VSA) Yoga Club
